leistungen.sustainability.title: Sustainability Is Our Standard
leistungen.sustainability.intro: Sustainability is not an add-on â€“ we build resource-efficiently by default. At S&S Messebau, every stand is a sustainability project.
leistungen.sustainability.co2.title: COâ‚‚ Offset for Transport
leistungen.sustainability.co2.desc: We offset our transport journeys with certified COâ‚‚ compensation â€“ for a climate-conscious trade show appearance.
leistungen.sustainability.systembau.desc: We consistently rely on modular systems that are reused and adapted â€“ no disposables, no waste.
leistungen.sustainability.projekt.title: Every Stand a Sustainability Project
leistungen.sustainability.projekt.desc: Every project is planned with sustainability in mind: materials, logistics, reuse â€“ considered from the very start.
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.title: How We Live Sustainability â€“ Every Day
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.text1: Our team drives with COâ‚‚ offset, no parts end up in the trash â€“ our comeback system and consistent repair come before disposal.
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.text2: Reusable elements are professionally stored after each trade show and prepared for the next deployment. This saves our clients up to 60% of materials â€“ while protecting the environment.
leistungen.sustainability.outro: Find details, facts and certificates about our sustainable approach on our Sustainability page.
sustainability.title: Sustainable Exhibition Construction
sustainability.subtitle: Environmentally conscious, cost-efficient, future-oriented â€“ our approach to sustainable exhibition construction.
sustainability.reuse.desc: Modular stand systems that can be used across multiple trade shows â€“ saving materials and costs.
sustainability.materials.desc: FSC-certified wood, LED lighting and recyclable materials for an environmentally conscious presentation.
sustainability.logistics.desc: Optimized transport planning and bundled deliveries reduce COâ‚‚ emissions.
sustainability.savings.desc: From the 2nd trade show onwards, sustainable systems pay for themselves â€“ good for the environment and your budget.

about.hero.subtitle: For many years we have been creating exhibition stands with passion and precision. As an owner-managed partnership from HÃ¼ckelhoven, we combine personal support with professional service.
about.story.title: Our Story
about.story.p1: What started as a small exhibition construction company is now an established full-service provider for trade show construction, event construction, and shop fitting throughout Germany.
about.story.p2: As a partnership, we rely on short decision-making processes and personal support. With us, your contact person speaks directly with the managing directors â€“ no long hierarchies, no delays.
about.story.p3: Through a strong network of long-standing partners in production, logistics, and technology, we offer the professionalism of large exhibition builders at fair mid-market conditions.
about.story.imageAlt: The S&S Messebau team during joint project planning
about.team.title: Our Team
about.team.desc: As an owner-managed partnership, Fabrice Noel Schippers and Parampuneet Singh are your direct contacts for all project phases â€“ from the first idea to dismantling.
about.werte.title: Our Values
about.werte.v1.title: Fairness
about.werte.v1.desc: Transparent pricing, honest advice, reliable execution.
about.werte.v2.title: Sustainability
about.werte.v2.desc: Reusable systems, local partners, long-lasting quality.
about.werte.v3.title: Partnership
about.werte.v3.desc: Long-term customer relationships instead of one-time transactions.
about.arbeitsweise.title: How We Work
about.arbeitsweise.w1.title: Personal
about.arbeitsweise.w1.desc: A dedicated contact person for your entire project
about.arbeitsweise.w2.title: Flexible
about.arbeitsweise.w2.desc: Adaptable to changes and special requests

about.arbeitsweise.w4.title: Transparent
about.arbeitsweise.w4.desc: Clear communication about costs, schedules, and processes
about.arbeitsweise.w5.title: Quality-Oriented
about.compare.title: S&S Messebau vs. Larger Competitors
about.compare.r5.competition: High capacity, large fleet, higher costs
about.compare.r7.competition: Large portfolios, but less personal support
about.cta.title: Get to Know Us
about.cta.text: Contact us for a no-obligation introductory meeting.
ablauf.hero.title: Process â€“ How Your Exhibition Stand Is Created
ablauf.hero.subtitle: From the first idea to aftercare â€“ this is how an exhibition project with S&S Messebau works.
ablauf.step1.title: Initial Meeting & Briefing
ablauf.step1.desc: We get to know your requirements, goals, and budget. Together we define the scope of your project.
ablauf.step2.title: Concept & Design
ablauf.step2.desc: Our designers develop initial drafts and concepts. Upon commissioning, also 3D visualizations â€“ depending on project scope.
ablauf.step3.title: Quote & Planning
ablauf.step3.desc: You receive a detailed quote with all items. After approval, we start the technical detail planning.
ablauf.step4.title: Production
ablauf.step4.desc: Our partners produce your stand with high-quality materials. You receive regular updates.
ablauf.step5.title: Logistics & Setup
ablauf.step5.desc: Punctual transport to the trade show and professional setup by our experienced team.
ablauf.step6.title: Support & Service
ablauf.step6.desc: During the trade show days, we are available for technical questions.
ablauf.step7.title: Dismantling & Aftercare
ablauf.step7.desc: Professional dismantling and optional storage for the next trade show. Joint evaluation of the exhibition success.
ablauf.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
ablauf.faq.q1: How much does an exhibition stand cost?
ablauf.faq.a1: Costs vary depending on size and features. A 50 sqm system stand is approx. â‚¬25,000-35,000, custom stands at â‚¬600-1,200/sqm. Contact us for an individual quote.
ablauf.faq.q2: How long does planning and production take?
ablauf.faq.a2: From briefing to completion, allow 8-12 weeks. For urgent projects, we can also work faster.
ablauf.faq.a3: Yes, we carry out projects nationwide and throughout Europe. International projects are also possible through our partner network.
ablauf.faq.a4: Absolutely! Our systems are designed for multiple use. We store your elements and adapt them for subsequent trade shows.
ablauf.faq.q5: What happens if something breaks during the trade show?
ablauf.faq.a5: We offer on-site service and are available for technical problems. We carry out minor repairs immediately.
ablauf.faq.q6: Do you also offer partial services?
ablauf.faq.a6: Yes, you can book individual services â€“ e.g., design only, setup only, or furniture only. We are flexible.
ablauf.faq.a7: Typically 50% deposit upon order, 40% before trade show start, 10% after dismantling. Individual arrangements are possible.
ablauf.faq.q8: Can we see the stand beforehand?
ablauf.faq.a8: Upon commissioning, we create 3D visualizations of your exhibition stand on request â€“ depending on project scope.
ablauf.faq.q9: What is included in the setup?
ablauf.faq.a9: Complete setup including furniture, lighting, technology. Not included: trade show connections (electricity, internet), catering.
ablauf.faq.a10: We rely on reusable systems, local partners, and durable materials. Details can be found on our sustainability page.
ablauf.cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
ablauf.cta.text: Let's talk about your next exhibition project.
nachhaltigkeit.hero.title: Sustainable Exhibition Construction â€“ System Building & Reuse
nachhaltigkeit.hero.subtitle: Exhibition construction doesn't have to be throwaway culture. With reusable systems, a local partner network, and intelligent planning, we protect the environment and your budget.
nachhaltigkeit.systeme.desc1: Our modular stand systems are used multiple times. After the trade show, we store your elements for the next deployment.
nachhaltigkeit.systeme.desc2: Short transport routes through regional partners in NRW and nationwide. This saves CO2 and costs.
nachhaltigkeit.systeme.desc3: High-quality materials that withstand many trade show deployments. No cheap solutions for single use.
nachhaltigkeit.business.title: The Business Advantage
nachhaltigkeit.business.subtitle: Sustainability pays off â€“ and quickly.
nachhaltigkeit.business.first.title: First Trade Show (New Purchase)
nachhaltigkeit.business.second.title: Second Trade Show (Reuse)
nachhaltigkeit.business.third.title: Third+ Trade Show
nachhaltigkeit.business.third.price: Still only â‚¬6,000-8,000 per trade show
nachhaltigkeit.business.imageAlt: Sustainable materials and environmentally conscious exhibition construction at S&S Messebau
nachhaltigkeit.measures.title: Our Sustainable Measures
nachhaltigkeit.measures.m4: Optimized transport planning for fewer trips
nachhaltigkeit.measures.m6: Repair instead of replacement for damages
nachhaltigkeit.cta.title: Sustainable AND Economical
nachhaltigkeit.cta.text: Let us show you how sustainable exhibition construction solutions can protect your budget.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1.title: 1. Privacy at a Glance
privacy.s1.subtitle: General Information
privacy.s1.text: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you.
privacy.s2.title: 2. Data Collection on This Website
privacy.s2.subtitle: Contact Form
privacy.s2.text1: When you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form, including the contact data you provided there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions.
privacy.s2.text2: We do not share this data without your consent.
privacy.s3.title: 3. Your Rights
privacy.s3.text1: You have the right at any time to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipients, and the purpose of data processing, as well as a right to correction or deletion of this data.
privacy.s3.text2: For this purpose and for further questions regarding personal data, you can contact us at any time at the address provided in the legal notice.
privacy.s4.title: 4. Contact
privacy.s4.text:
Responsible for data processing:
S&S Messebau GbR
Fabrice Noel Schippers & Parampuneet Singh
MarienstraÃŸe 37
41836 HÃ¼ckelhoven
Email: info@sundsmessebau.com

step1.title: What do you need the banners for?

step2.title: Technical Details

step2.error.hoehe: Height must be between 50 and 400 cm
step2.largeFormat: Large format, transport may be multi-part
step2.profil.label: Profile/Finish *
step2.ecken.label: Corners *
step2.seitigkeit.label: Sides *
step2.led.label: Backlighting desired? (LED/Backlit)
step2.led.hint: LED backlit makes your message visually striking
step3.title: Do you also need printing?
step3.subtitle: We can print banners in various materials or you can supply your own banners.
step3.bannerNeeded.label: Banner needed? *
step3.bannerNeeded.no: No, I have my own banners
step3.material.label: Material *
step3.material.frontlit.label: Frontlit 450g
step3.material.blockout.label: Blockout 510g
step3.material.mesh.label: Mesh 350g
step3.material.backlit.label: Backlit 450g
step3.hints.outdoor: For outdoor use we recommend Mesh (wind-permeable) or Blockout (extra sturdy)
step3.hints.backlit: For LED backlighting, translucent Backlit material is optimal
step3.konfektion.label: Finishing
step3.fireProtection.label: B1 fire protection certificate required?
step3.fireProtection.hint: Most trade fairs require B1 fire protection. We include the certificate.

step3.printQuality.standard.label: Standard (720dpi)
step3.printQuality.standard.desc: For normal viewing â€“ sufficient for 95% of cases
step3.printQuality.high.label: High (1440dpi)
step3.printDataNotice.title: Print data notice:
step3.printDataNotice.text: You upload your print data in the next step. Format: PDF, AI, EPS (CMYK, 100dpi, final size + 2cm bleed)
step4.title: Upload Print Data
step4.subtitle: Upload your print data or book our graphic design service.
step4.noGraphicService: No, I need graphic design service
step4.printRequirements.title: Print data requirements:
step4.printRequirements.text: Format CMYK, minimum 100dpi resolution, final size plus 2cm bleed per side. Our team is happy to help with any questions.
step4.graphicService.title: Graphic design service:
step4.graphicService.text: Our design team creates your print data according to your specifications. Costs are listed separately in the quote (from â‚¬49 for simple layouts).
step4.designDescription.label: Describe your design vision *
step4.designDescription.hint: The more detailed, the better we can realize your vision.
step4.designDescription.placeholder: Example: Company logo centered at top, slogan below in red, product photos at bottom, background in company colors blue/white, modern look...
step4.logoUpload.label: Upload logo & CI elements (optional)
step4.logoUpload.hint: If available, upload your company logo and other graphics.
step4.comment.label: Special requirements or notes? (optional)
step4.comment.hint: e.g. special deadline, sample requested, phone callback required

step5.expressLabel: Express production desired? (3-5 business days, surcharge in quote)

bannerrahmen.systems.hanging.title: Hanging Frames
bannerrahmen.systems.hanging.description: For ceiling mounting or suspension. Ideal for trade show stands and exhibitions. Easy banner change via keder system.
bannerrahmen.systems.standing.title: Standing Frames
bannerrahmen.systems.standing.descriptio: Freestanding with stable base. Perfect for events, stores, and changing locations. Mobile and quick to set up.
bannerrahmen.systems.cladding.title: Cladding Frames
bannerrahmen.systems.cladding.descriptio: For wall mounting or as cladding. Ideal for retail construction and permanent installations. Elegant look with frameless mounting possible.

bannerrahmen.materials.frontlit.title: Frontlit Standard
bannerrahmen.materials.frontlit.descript: Universal material for indoor and light outdoor use. Brilliant colors, long-lasting.
bannerrahmen.materials.blockout.title: Blockout Premium
bannerrahmen.materials.blockout.descript: Opaque for double-sided printing. Extra stable for permanent outdoor use.
bannerrahmen.materials.mesh.title: Mesh Outdoor
bannerrahmen.materials.mesh.description: Wind-permeable, ideal for facades and large outdoor formats. Reduces wind load.
bannerrahmen.materials.backlit.title: Backlit LED
bannerrahmen.materials.backlit.descripti: Translucent for LED backlighting. Maximum luminosity and long-range visibility.

advisor.title: AI Trade Fair Advisor
advisor.subtitle: Intelligent support for your trade fair planning
advisor.intro: Our digital trade fair advisor is available around the clock to answer your questions about budgets, planning, materials, and logistics. Take advantage of the innovative voice input for an especially convenient experience.
advisor.budget.title: Budget Calculator
advisor.budget.description: Get instant budget estimates based on booth size, equipment, and your specific requirements.
advisor.timeline.title: Timeline Planner
advisor.timeline.description: Detailed schedules from initial consultation to trade fair date with all important milestones and deadlines.
advisor.material.title: Material Advisor
advisor.material.description: Recommendations for suitable systems, materials, and sustainable solutions for your trade fair project.
advisor.voice.title: Voice input available
advisor.voice.description: Ask your questions conveniently by voice. Click the microphone icon in the chat and speak your question â€“ processing happens directly in your browser without external servers.
advisor.examples.title: Example Questions
advisor.examples.q1: "How much does a 50 sqm booth including setup cost for the Anuga?"
advisor.examples.q2: "How long does the planning and implementation of a custom booth take?"
advisor.examples.q3: "What sustainable system solutions do you offer?"
advisor.examples.q4: "What is the difference between a system booth and a custom booth?"
advisor.examples.q5: "How does logistics work for a trade fair in Munich?"
advisor.examples.q6: "Can you show me references from the food industry?"
advisor.voiceTip.title: Voice input tip
advisor.voiceTip.description: Click the microphone icon in the chat and speak your question naturally. Speech recognition works best in a quiet environment. Speak clearly and at a normal pace.
advisor.howItWorks.title: How does the AI advisor work?
advisor.howItWorks.step1.title: Open chat
advisor.howItWorks.step1.description: Navigate to the contact page and click "Start chat" in the AI advisor section.
advisor.howItWorks.step2.title: Ask a question
advisor.howItWorks.step2.description: Type your question or use voice input. Feel free to use the quick actions for common inquiries.
advisor.howItWorks.step3.title: Get an answer
advisor.howItWorks.step3.description: The AI advisor analyzes your inquiry and provides you with precise answers tailored to S&S Messebau with concrete information.
advisor.howItWorks.step4.title: Dig deeper
advisor.howItWorks.step4.description: Ask follow-up questions or explore additional topics. For complex projects, the advisor automatically recommends a personal consultation.

smtp.testModeDesc: Emails are simulated and only displayed in the console. Configure SendGrid or AWS SES for real email delivery.

smtp.providerSesDesc: AWS service, affordable, requires AWS account
smtp.fromEmailHint: This email address must be verified with your provider
smtp.sendgridDesc: SendGrid is a reliable email service with 100 free emails per day.

smtp.sendgridStep4: Paste API Key here and save
smtp.sendgridApiKeyHint: API Key starts with "SG." and has Full Access permission
smtp.sesDesc: Amazon Simple Email Service - cost-effective for high volumes.
smtp.sesStep2: Activate SES service in desired region
smtp.sesStep5: Create IAM Credentials with SES permission
smtp.sesWarning: AWS SES integration requires additional configuration (Secret Access Key, Signature). For easier integration we recommend SendGrid.
smtp.recStartDesc: Use SendGrid - easy setup, 100 free emails/day, perfect for banner orders.
smtp.recVolumeDesc: AWS SES is cheaper for >10,000 emails/month, but more complex to set up.
smtp.recTestMode: In test mode, emails are simulated and only displayed in the browser console.
